text: Christoph Westerthaler (11 January 1965 – 20 July 2018Twitter page from Eintracht Frankfurt, www.twitter.com, 21 July 2018) was an Austrian football coach and former football player. He was born in Silz, Austria. He made his debut for Austria in an October 1989 friendly match against Malta. He was a small-built striker who started his professional career at FC Wacker Innsbruck and stayed with them for 9 years. Westerthaler died on 20 July 2018 from a heart attack, aged 53.Ex-Wacker-Torjäger Westerthaler verstorben ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga top scorers Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian football midfielders
title: Christoph Westerthaler
